Detailed Description

Device specific parameters used at init call.

Field Documentation

UInt32 Bsp_Ar12xxDevInitParams::desPortMap

Deserializer port number to device ID mapping

EDMA3_DRV_Handle Bsp_Ar12xxDevInitParams::edmaHandle

EDMA Handle used to transfer the McSPI data

UInt32 Bsp_Ar12xxDevInitParams::i2cDevAddr

I2C Device Address used for back channel configuration Applicable for Satellite Radar module via FPD-Link

UInt32 Bsp_Ar12xxDevInitParams::i2cDevInst

I2C Device Instance ID used for back channel configuration Applicable for Satellite Radar module via FPD-Link

Bsp_Ar12xxGpioInputParams Bsp_Ar12xxDevInitParams::inGpioParams[BSP_AR12XX_GPIO_INPUT_COUNT]

GPIO params associated with each AR12 device input to the host

UInt32 Bsp_Ar12xxDevInitParams::mcspiChannel

McSPI device channel number

UInt32 Bsp_Ar12xxDevInitParams::mcSpiDevInst

McSPI device instance ID used to create the GIO device

Bsp_Ar12xxGpioOutputParams Bsp_Ar12xxDevInitParams::outGpioParams[BSP_AR12XX_GPIO_OUTPUT_COUNT]

GPIO params associated with each AR12 device output from the host

char Bsp_Ar12xxDevInitParams::radarConfigName[BSP_AR12XX_MAX_SENSOR_NAME_LENGTH]

Name of the radar sensor used by the application

UInt32 Bsp_Ar12xxDevInitParams::uartDevInst

UART Device Instance ID used to flash the AR12xx QSPI Flash
